extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      static int MOUSE_LENIENCY

    • Constructor Detail

      • Waypoint

        public Waypoint(double x,
        double y,
        int type)
        Constructor for waypoints
        Parameters:
        x - the x coord of the waypoint
        y - the y coord of the waypoint
        type - whether the waypoint is: 0: a normal waypoint, 1: a point where aircraft may enter and leave the airspace, 2: an airport waypoint

    • Method Detail

      • position

        public Vector position()
        Gets the waypoint position
        Returns:
        the position of the waypoint.

      • isMouseOver

        public boolean isMouseOver(int mx,
                  int my)
        Checks if the mouse is over the waypoint, within MOUSE_LENIENCY
        Parameters:
        mx - the mouse's x location
        my - the mouse's y location
        Returns:
        whether the mouse is considered over the waypoint.

      • type

        public int type()
        Gets the waypoints type:

        • 0: Normal waypoint
        • 1: Entry/Exit point
        • 2: Airport waypoint

        Returns:
        Waypoint type

      • getCost

        public double getCost(Waypoint fromPoint)
        Gets the cost of travelling between this waypoint and another Used for pathfinding
        Parameters:
        fromPoint - The point to consider cost from, to this waypoint
        Returns:
        the distance (cost) between the two waypoints

      • getCostBetween

        public static double getCostBetween(Waypoint source,
                    Waypoint target)
        Gets the cost between two waypoints
        Parameters:
        source - the source waypoint
        target - the target waypoint
        Returns:
        the cost between source and target

        double y)
        Draws the waypoint
